system.availability: If allies in 30 metres inflict Righteous Fury they auto-pass second attack test. Once per Combat encounter, wielder may make -10 Command Test as Free action, if succeed, allies in 30 metres can move towards the banner or charge at a foe up to a distance of the Wielder's Agility Bonus as a Free Action.
